constants.name: plasma_transport
constants.header: Translation table for different types of transport coefficients.

int.name: unspecified
int.description: Unspecified transport type

int.name: combined
int.description: Combination of data from all available transport models

int.name: transport_solver
int.description: Output from a transport solver

int.name: background
int.description: Background transport level, ad-hoc transport model not directly related to a physics model

int.name: database
int.description: Transport specified by a database entry external to the dynamic evolution of the plasma

int.name: anomalous
int.description: Representation of turbulent transport

int.name: mhd
int.description: Transport arising from MHD frequency modes

int.name: ntm
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of NTMs

int.name: sawteeth
int.description: Transport arising from the presence of sawteeth

int.name: elm_continuous
int.description: Continuous ELM model --- gives the ELM averaged profile

int.name: elm_resolved
int.description: Time resolved ELM model

int.name: pedestal
int.description: Transport level to give edge pedestal

int.name: not_provided
int.description: No data provided

int.name: combined_radial
int.description: Combination of data from all available radial transport models

int.name: background_radial
int.description: Background radial transport level

int.name: database_radial
int.description: Radial transport specified by a database entry

int.name: prescribed_radial
int.description: Radial transport model prescribed from code input parameters

int.name: combined_parallel
int.description: Combination of data from all available radial transport models

int.name: background_parallel
int.description: Background radial transport level

int.name: database_parallel
int.description: Parallel transport specified by a database entry

int.name: prescribed_parallel
int.description: Â¨Parallel transport model prescribed from code input parameters

int.name: twenty_one_moment_parallel
int.description: 21 moment fluid closure model

int.name: braginskii_parallel
int.description: Braginskii fluid transport model
